successes.title: Video Game High School
successes.description: An action/comedy series about surviving high school, fitting in, and landing that perfect head shot.

Pledges.description: Your name (and/or gamertag) in the credits.
All the above, PLUS: HD digital downloads of each episode as they come out, as well as an HD download of the whole series once it's finished.
All the above, PLUS: An exclusive DVD of the series with limited edition cover art, signed by cast and crew.

All the above, PLUS: An exclusive Blu-Ray of the series with limited edition cover art, signed by cast and crew. The Blu-Ray content is identical to the DVD, except it's in 1080p HD. Also please note - if you pledged ABOVE this amount, you'll have the option of receiving the Blu-Ray OR the DVD!
All the above, PLUS: A special VGHS Poster, not available to the general public, signed by cast and crew, as well as an exclusive VGHS t-shirt.
All the above, PLUS: A signed copy of the shooting script, and a special personalized video thank you from Freddie.
All the above, PLUS: A Skype call with Freddie. You'll also get the address of a secret priority email inbox, where I guarantee all your emails will be answered by me in a timely fashion.
All the above, PLUS: Your choice of either: 1. A one-on-one consultation on your YouTube Channel/Facebook/Twitter strategy OR 2. Signed props from FreddieW videos as well as from the series
All the above, PLUS: Associate Producer credit on the series, as well as your likeness inserted into the series.
All the above , PLUS: Super exclusive LEET MYSTERY BOX filled with tons of LEET STUFF lovingly handpacked by Freddie. Additionally, your name or gamertag featured prominently in the series.
PLEASE NOTE: This reward is ONLY available to the people who pledge this amount!

All the above (except where noted), PLUS: Because you are a TRUE PATRIOT, you will receive a replica of the United States Declaration of Independence, except signed by us, and a copy of Nicholas Cage's action-adventure epic "National Treasure," and a special custom video where Freddie dresses as a Founding Father (of your choice) and orders himself (as himself) to build this country a railroad.
PLEASE NOTE: This reward is ONLY available to the person who pledges this amount!

All the above (except where noted), PLUS: Attendance at a weekend filmmaking bootcamp, taught by Freddie and Brandon, in Los Angeles - our entire filmmaking experience distilled into one action packed weekend, where we teach you everything we know. (Travel expenses not included)
PLEASE NOTE: This reward is ONLY available to the people who pledge this amount!
